overview: Ahead of the college senior year, In-young and Jeong-eun are going camping for their last winter trip. A day before the trip, In-young takes out the camcorder she used as a child to keep a record. In-young, who shoots the landscape with a camcorder while heading to a destination, unknowingly keeps showing Jeong-eun's appearance on the screen. In-young’s such behavior bothers Jeong-eun.
title: In-young's Camcorder
